CGI-Link Advantages

  • Allows CGI-BIN to remain running

    • Avoids costly application or database startup/termination

    • Can implement 'light' persistance easily by maintaining state in memory

    • Can service multiple requests with same program by using threads (or in Smalltalk, using Processes).

  • IPC between CGI-Link client and server allows HTTPD server and CGI programs to reside on different hosts
